Tools Module
============

The Tools module provides various data processing and analysis utilities.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Tools
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Volume Creation
---------------

Create volumetric datasets from image stacks.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Tools.create_vol
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Metadata Extraction
-------------------

Extract metadata from various image file formats.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Tools.extract_meta
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Polar Artifact Removal
-----------------------

Remove polar artifacts from reconstructed tomography data.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Tools.polar_removal
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Tomopy Reconstruction
---------------------

Tomographic reconstruction utilities using TomoPy.

.. automodule:: DataTools.Tools.tomopy_reco
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
